TT's brother takes a small Asian Bull elephant mode.  He takes an 
automatic laser rifle, an injection needle filled with the green gas 
labeled "ML".  He sends out a message.

L:  This is Predicon unit....Legacy.  I am seeking any Predicon forces 
on this planet.  It is time to grasp for the future by disrupting the 
past.

He grabs a small rodent and heads west.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> The craft nears Earth as it comes out of Transwarp space.  
Discusting 
> memories return of what the gas can do.  Just then the computer 
screen 
> comes on.  It shows a ship near the moon.
> 
> Computer:  Lutienent we have deteched a transformer vessel near the 
> moon.  We have also deteched close to 300 transformer signitures on 
> the planet.
> 
> L:  There's no way ny brother could have beaten me here and gotten 
so 
> many transformers in one place.
> 
> C:  Not all read Maximal.  Some are Predicon, Autobot, 
> Deciticon, Neutral, and some factions we've never heard of.
> 
> L looks at the ship on screen.
> 
> L:  That's the Ark.  Our victory is at hand. I'VE GOT TO GET ON 
BOARD! 
> COMPUTER QUICKLY!
> 
> They attempt to manuver to the Ark but Bob's ship (or whatever rAuq 
> said it was gets in the way and they get caught by the moons 
gravity.
> 
> L:  Oh well plan A after all prepare the gas.
> 
> C:  I'm afraid we can neither break the gravities hold nor dump the 
> poison from this far away from the atmosphere.  Transwarp is out  
> because of the Asteroid belt.  It could take months to estimate the 
> right timing and directions.
> 
> L: DANG! Oh well you said Predicons and Decipticons.  I'm sure they 
> can help.  Prepare the escape pod. And fire whatever weapons we have 
> (just 4 small laser cannons) at that thing.
> 
> He heads toward Eastern Asia.  And each cannon fires on Bob.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > OOC: This is going to sound a heck of alot like fanfic.  Also rAuq 
> is 
> > the only one I've discussed this with (since I didn't need to 
unban 
> > anything just make sure it wasn't banned to start with), but he 
may 
> > notice I changed a few details.  He'll start interacting when he 
> gets 
> > to Earth.
> > 
> > BIC:  A Pred lutient that looks like TT stands infront of a large 
> > tanker (not to be confused with tankor).  A green gas is pumped 
into 
> > the holding area.  A general walks up to him.
> > 
> > G:  You sure you want to fly this alone.
> > 
> > L:  So long as I'm one step ahead of my brother whose to stop me.
> > 
> > G:  Don't underestimate your brother.  If he thinks there's a 
chance 
> > to stop you he'd fight even if it meant civilian casualties.
> > 
> > L: He has no idea where Earth is anyway.  It's not like he's just 
> > going to get lucky and crash there.  And what's so hard about 
> getting 
> > into the orbit of a planet and dumping a biological weapon in 
there 
> > atmosphere to wipe out all organic life and make sure the 
> Decipticons 
> > win the great wars.
> > 
> > G:  You do realize you were a Maximal Protoform.
> > 
> > L:  The Autobot fight to  the death hero's on the Ark aren't 
related 
> > to me, and the ones back on Cybertron would hopefully surrender to 
> the 
> > decipticons.  Me and my brother would be one big happy Pred family 
> in 
> > our own time.
> > 
> > G:  After seeing what this did to those Tranconians I have no 
doubt 
> > this gas can do the job.  If something goes wrong just get into 
the 
> > escape pod and land remember.
> > 
> > L:  What could go wrong.
> > 
> > G:  I don't know.  They just teach us high up officers to say 
stuff 
> > like that if we want to be popular and to say fight to the death 
if 
> we 
> > want to be remembered in history as that great General who sadly 
> died 
> > young possibly in a Mutiny.
> > 
> > L:  Once there aren't any humans to back up the Autobots we win.  
> > What's so hard about that.
> > 
> > G:  Well when I visited Megatron in prison and he gave me this 
> > information it sounded like it had been pretty tough for him.
> > 
> > L:  That was because of that Dinobot idiot.  After the tribes 
> > scattered he didn't have the weapons or tech to wipe them all out 
so 
> > he just went for the Ark.
> > 
> > G:  Well then you better be off.
> > 
> > L:  Goodbye.
> > 
> > He get's in and pilots it to Earth.
> > 
> > OOC: I know I should have saved this a while longer, but I have a 
> plan 
> > to keep the threat to Earth without carring it out.
